description: The hills come alive again with the noise of mountain railways and cable cars.
title: Coronavirus: Swiss Alps yearn for the sound of tourists
title_page: Coronavirus: Swiss Alps yearn for the sound of tourists - BBC News
maintext: "But, we say, if you can't keep the distance of two metres you should wear a mask. We hope people will take them with them but we will also sell them at the stations, and our people working in the trains will all wear masks as well."
